scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin p1-bootcamp.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/p1-bootcamp.html && usemin p2-bootweek1.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/p2-bootweek1.html && usemin contact.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contact.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
